name: MP3 FATX Renamer/FTPer
short_description: Platform-independent Python/Tkinter-based MP3 renaming and FTPing utility for use with Evolution-X on the XBox.  Recursively searches directories, temporarily renames files if necessary for fatx compatibility, and ftps them to Evolution-X's ftp server.
